import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Stats } from '../ui/Stats' export default function CustomerList() { const [customers, setCustomers] = useState([]) const [ageAvg, setageAvg] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:4000/customer/') .then(({ data }) => setCustomers(data.data)) axios.get('http://localhost:4000/customer/average/') .then(({ data }) => setageAvg(data.data.age_average)) // .then(({ data }) => console.log(data)) }, []) return (
{/* */} {customers.map((customer, customerIdx) => ( {/* */} ))}
Nombre Apellido Edad Edit
{customer.first_name} {customer.last_name} {customer.age} Edit
) }
